title: Solaris Portal - ErgoDocs
summary: Solaris is a software-as-a-service designed for micro, small and medium sized businesses to create their own no-code blockchain based solutions. For example, individual product creators and businesses making customer through Solaris can tokenize, futurize and list unique pieces on a global marketplace, whilst embedding traceability and the creation process.
